name: Mahabodhi Temple
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Mahabodhi Temple is where Gautama Buddha is said to have attained enlightenment.

name: Nalanda University
description: One of the oldest universities in the world, Nalanda was a renowned center for learning during ancient times.

name: Vikramshila Monastery
description: An ancient Buddhist university, second only to Nalanda, known for its intellectual contributions.

name: Barabar Caves
description: The oldest surviving rock-cut caves in India, these caves are an architectural marvel from the Maurya period.
